data.comment: The match has started at Volgograd Arena.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Free kick Ufa.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 6, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Ufa throw-in in Volgograd's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Ufa.
In the minute 11, Volgograd have a goal kick.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a throw-in for Volgograd, close to Ufa's area.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Ufa to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Throw-in Volgograd.
Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Ufa at Volgograd Arena.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Volgograd a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Volgograd needs to be cautious. Ufa have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 21, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Ufa to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Timur Zhamaletdinov (Ufa) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Volgograd Arena.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Volgograd have a goal kick.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ufa are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 28, Oleg Danchenko (Ufa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
In the minute 29, Ufa's Vladislav Kamilov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Volgograd Arena.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Volgograd throw-in in Ufa's half.
In the minute 30, In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Volgograd.
Ufa have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Ufa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Volgograd's half?
In the minute 34, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Volgograd a goal kick.
In the minute 37, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Volgograd in Volgograd.
Volgograd drive upfield and Beka Mikeltadze gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ufa defender.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 41, Can Ufa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Volgograd's half?
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Vladislav Kamilov is booked for the away team.
In the minute 43, Can Ufa capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Oleg Aleynik (Volgograd) has received a yellow card from Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Important block from the Volgograd defence as Filip Mrzljak fires in a strike for Ufa.
In the minute 44, Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Volgograd.
Timur Zhamaletdinov (Ufa) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Ufa.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Volgograd throw-in in Ufa's half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Volgograd Arena.
In the minute 45, Nikolai Kipiani (Volgograd) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ufa's Filip Mrzljak has been booked in Volgograd.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Kamil Mullin is on a sub for Nikolai Kipiani for Volgograd.
At Volgograd Arena, Dmitri Sysuev has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ufa pushes forward through Filip Mrzljak, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 48, Sergey Makarov of Volgograd gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Ufa at Volgograd Arena.
Throw-in for Ufa at Volgograd Arena.
In the minute 50, Konstantin Pliyev (Ufa) has received a first yellow card.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 52, Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Beka Mikeltadze (Volgograd) gets a yellow card.
Oleg Aleynik (Volgograd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 54, Free kick Ufa.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
In the minute 56, The away team have replaced Vladislav Kamilov with Artem Golubev. This is the first substitution made today by Rashid Rahimov.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the away team a throw-in.
Volgograd have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 59, Danil Stepanov is booked for the home team.
At Volgograd Arena, Ufa are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 61, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Volgograd just outside Ufa's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 63, Volgograd have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Jemal Tabidze for Ufa has been booked by Vasiliy Kazarcev and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Volgograd.
At Volgograd Arena, Sergey Makarov has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 67, Ufa drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
In the minute 73, Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Ufa a goal kick.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Grigori Morozov has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
In the minute 75, Volgograd to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Rashid Rahimov is making the team's second substitution at Volgograd Arena with Bojan Jokic replacing Dmitri Sysuev.
In the minute 77, Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Volgograd move into a 1-0 lead through a Kamil Mullin header.
Sergey Makarov with an assist there.
In the minute 79, Throw-in Volgograd.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
Evgeniy Pesegov is replacing Beka Mikeltadze for the home team.
In the minute 81, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Timur Zhamaletdinov (Ufa) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Volgograd are coming forward and Danil Stepanov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Volgograd.
In the minute 85, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Volgograd throw-in in Ufa's half.
In Volgograd Ufa attack through Timur Zhamaletdinov. The finish is off target, however.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Volgograd to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 89, Sergey Serchenkov is replacing Zurab Davitashvili for Volgograd at Volgograd Arena.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Ufa at Volgograd Arena.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Free kick in a good position for Volgograd!
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Ufa.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
